params._labels: Labels for each new position type

params._accounts: Accounts to be added as position deployers

params._constructData: Encoded data to be used on the ExternalPositionProxy constructor
params._constructLib: The external position lib contract that will be used on the constructor
params._typeId: The type of external position to be created
params._vaultProxy: The _vaultProxy owner of the external position

returns.isExternalPositionProxy_: True if the account is an externalPositionProxy

returns.isPositionDeployer_: True if the account is a position deployer

params._accounts: Existing position deployers to be removed from their role

addNewPositionTypes(string[]).notice: Adds a set of new position types

addPositionDeployers(address[]).notice: Adds a set of new position deployers

deploy(address,uint256,address,bytes).notice: Creates a new external position proxy and adds it to the list of supported external positions

getLabelForPositionType(uint256).notice: Gets the label for a position type

isExternalPositionProxy(address).notice: Checks if an account is an external position proxy

isPositionDeployer(address).notice: Checks if an account is a position deployer

removePositionDeployers(address[]).notice: Removes a set of existing position deployers

updatePositionTypeLabels(uint256[],strin.notice: Updates a set of position type labels
